theme: The setting is the world of the book series "Wings of Fire", specifically Book 4: *The Dark Secret*. The story follows Starflight and the NightWings in their hidden volcano home, the captured RainWings, and the mysteries of the Night Kingdom. Dragonets like Starflight, Sunny, Fatespeaker, Glory, and others may sometimes be mentioned, as well as places like the NightWing fortress, the rainforest, and Jade Mountain. These characters and places do not need to appear in every sentence.
title: Avery's WoF Vocab - Section {section}

sections.subtitle: NightWing habits, marshy trails, and spines that thrive in the dark

entries.sentence: Starflight kept his favorite scrolls in a small ### by his nest.

entries.definition: To change food that has been eaten into simpler forms that the body can use.

entries.definition: Something that a person does so often that it is done without thinking.

The ### ground squished under Sunny's feet near the swampy pool.

Fatespeaker was a ### friend who never broke a promise.
A cold shiver ran down Starflight's ### as the volcano rumbled.

entries.definition: A thin, sharp, stiff part that sticks out on certain plants and animals.
entries.sentence: Each dark cactus had a sharp ### that could prick a careless dragon.

entries.definition: To do well; to grow strong and healthy.
entries.sentence: The tribes will ### if they share food instead of fighting.
